snippet: The dispute has pitted local residents against the Third Church of Christ Scientist, which leases much of its building to a caterer who wants a liquor license for the various events he hosts.
abstract: Proposal in New York State Legislature would override regulators and grant a liquor license to Manhattan caterer Rose Group Park Avenue, which is located within 200 feet of a church; bill is latest maneuver in longstanding battle and is causing an unusual rift among Democratic lawmakers because bill's sponsor, Democratic Assemblyman Joseph R Lentol, is from Brooklyn and is being accused of meddling in Manhattan affairs.
lead_paragraph: The dispute has pitted local residents against the Third Church of Christ Scientist, which leases much of its building to a caterer who wants a liquor license for the various events he hosts.

headline.seo: Fighting Over a Liquor License, From Park Avenue to Albany
headline.main: Liquor-License Fight Moves From Park Ave. to Albany
headline.print_headline: Liquor-License Fight Moves From Park Ave. to Albany

keywords.value: Scientist, Third Church of Christ, Scientist
keywords.name: organizations
